label: A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-002
title: Pt$_{2}$Ge$_{3}$ Structure
comments: This structure has the same AFLOW label, A3B2\_oP20\_62\_3c\_2c, as \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-001}{stibnite (Sb$_{2}$S$_{3}$, $D5_{8}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_oP20_62_3c_2c-003}{ottemannite (Sn$_{2}$S$_{3}$)}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
